sentences.en: "Nirvana" squared the circle by making a record that was both superb pop and rock music at the same time.
sentences.cn: “涅磐”乐队做到了不可能做到的事，录制了一张既有流行风又带有摇滚范儿的唱片。

sentences.en: Both 4 G technologies promise wireless nirvana: fast, ubiquitous broadband.
sentences.cn: 两种4G技术都许诺无线天堂: 快速, 无处不在的宽带.

sentences.en: Entering the realm of Nirvana is only possible for those who have become pure.
Every human being possesses an inner Nirvana allall realities, and all phenomena.
sentences.cn: 人人心中本来具有[自性涅盘], 含藏万有,具足一切法.

sentences.en: He has gone over the hill in search of nirvana.
sentences.cn: 在寻找解脱的过程中,他开小差了.

sentences.en: It is incorrect to say that Nirvana is negative or positive.
sentences.cn: 说涅盘是正面的或负面的是不正确的.

sentences.en: It is not some elusive nirvana of perfection and romantic sunsets.
sentences.cn: 它不是一些难以捉摸的完美涅磐和浪漫的夕阳.

sentences.en: Nirvana is beyond all terms of duality and relatively.

sentences.en: People often ask: What is there after Nirvana?

sentences.en: The Buddhism yearns for vimukta, and goes after nirvana realm.
